/>
X.iv.1.D.1.b
.
Alcoholism as a Primary Disability
Alcoholism as a primary disability is
not
a basis for granting entitlement to or increasing compensation or Veterans Pension under the laws administered by the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA).
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D  - Disability  or Death from Use of Alcohol, Drugs, or Tobacco Products
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D
